short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stellt die direkte Google Maps Vorschau in den Suchergebnissen wieder her.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GoogleMapsRestore is a must-have extension for anyone who prefers the classic Google Maps experience. With this extension, you'll bring back the convenient Google Maps button, allowing you to easily access maps from various Google services. Additionally, this extension restores the ability to click on location images, instantly redirecting you to Google Maps. No matter where you are or what new features Google introduces, GoogleMapsRestore ensures you always have direct access to Google Maps with a single click.
